results.content: Bad audio, too much zoom in certain parts of the lesson, difficult to understand due to speaking fast in a few minutes, there are duplicate downloadable files and missing downloadable files. He uses an old version of excel making it more difficult to apply what it says. The face cam is very annoying and bulky. The course is poorly organized, there are sections with a higher level of difficulty that are placed earlier than sections with a lower level of difficulty.
results.content_html: Bad audio, too much zoom in certain parts of the lesson, difficult to understand due to speaking fast in a few minutes, there are duplicate downloadable files and missing downloadable files. He uses an old version of excel making it more difficult to apply what it says. The face cam is very annoying and bulky. The course is poorly organized, there are sections with a higher level of difficulty that are placed earlier than sections with a lower level of difficulty.

results.content: I feel I was little too advance for this course personally but for anyone totally new to Excel it is absolutely amazing! I wish I would have had this available to me when I started my Excel journey. I absolutely loved Todd, the way he explains things is very clear and very easy to follow!

results.content: So far I've learnt a lot! Words can't describe how much knowledge I've been filled out with during this course so far. Im pretty sure that once I'm done with this course, that new skill will boost my chance of getting into my desired job field.

results.content: It's good that Todd gives short quizzes to help me recall what he did in the video. I also like the on-screen key shortcuts for commonly used tasks.
